title: Up and Down
description: The tables are turned: having magically stopped aging in the 19th century, Lilly Linton is no longer the secretary for cold, stone faced business-magnate Rikkard Ambrose. Now, in the 21st century, the roles are reversed. In their fierce struggle for control, who will emerge on top?In this short story, everything about your favourite characters from Robert Thier's story 'Storm and Silence' is turned on it's head. A hilarious little trip into the madness of alternative realities.
author: Robert Thier
